main.name: Krisztian Holub
main.occupation: Software Engineer for AuctionZip at Invaluable
main.description: Professional Web Developer. JavaScript, React, D3, jQuery, Node.js, SQL, MySQL, Firebase, MongoDB, Express.js, Redux, AJAX, JSON, WebAPI, WordPress, OOP, MVC, REST, HTML5, CSS3, Less and Sass.
main.description-main: Hi, I'm Krisztian Holub I design and build beautiful things and I love what I do.
main.bio: I am a strong conceptual thinker with an extreme interest in information technology. My main abilities are designing and execution of code with a diversity of each project. I possess commitment and enthusiasm to develop websites and web applications that fulfill the requirements of the client for a fast-growing business. I have a stunning track record for the development of dynamic and fluid web interfaces. I am an ambitious problem solver for the online business, and I would like to join a team of developers to exhibit my skills and abilities for the development of responsive, cross-browser, cross-platform and bug-free projects.
main.skills: JavaScript, jQuery, D3, React, Node.js, Express, Redux, AJAX, JSON, WebAPI, C/C++/C#, PHP, SQL, MariaDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Firebase, GraphQL, MongoDB, OOP, MVC, REST, WordPress, HTML5, CSS3, Less and Sass.
main.tools: Chrome DevTools, Git/GitHub, Command Line, NPM, Composer, Glup, Babel, Webpack, Bootstrap, Semantic UI, Material-UI, BEM. Photoshop, XD, Sketch, Figma.
